entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is trying to use Floo powder for the first time.

entities.name: floocloak
entities.description: Harry's cloak that he pulls off at the beginning of the passage.

entities.name: fireplace
entities.description: The fireplace where Harry finds the Floo powder and tries to use it.

entities.name: floopowder
entities.description: A small box containing glit-tering powder that allows for transportation through fireplaces.

entities.name: grimmauldplace
entities.description: The destination of Harry's Floo powder journey, which is located at number twelve Grimmauld Place.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: The owner of the office where Harry is standing when he uses the Floo powder.

relationships.description: Harry pulls off his cloak, indicating that it is removed by him.
The fireplace is where Harry finds the Floo powder and tries to use it.
Harry uses the Floo powder by sticking his head into the fireplace and taking a large pinch of powder.
Harry travels to Grimmauld Place using the Floo powder, as indicated by his loud and clear statement of 'Number twelve, Grimmauld Place!'
Harry is standing in Umbridge's office when he uses the Floo powder.
